remarks: According to ~ df-subc , the subcategories ` ( Subcat `` C ) ` of a category ` C ` are subsets of the homomorphisms of ` C ` ( see ~ subcssc and ~ subcss2 ).  Therefore, the set of commutative ring homomorphisms (i.e. ring homomorphisms from a commutative ring to a commutative ring) is a "subcategory" of the category of (unital) rings.  (Contributed by AV, 19-Feb-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
